notes: Indeterminate solid nodule requiring follow-up imaging
report:
FINDINGS: A 12.5mm solid nodule is present in the right lower lobe. The lesion demonstrates mild spiculation and lobulation with somewhat irregular margins. No calcification is identified. No prior imaging available for comparison.

IMPRESSION: Indeterminate pulmonary nodule in the right lower lobe. The appearance is nonspecific and malignancy cannot be excluded. Recommend follow-up CT in 3 months or PET-CT for further characterization.
